results.name: Exponential convolution of Fibonacci numbers with themselves.

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,2,-4).
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} Fibonacci(k)*Fibonacci(n-k)*binomial(n, k)). - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 11 2005
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
